201.headline: 200 Success
201.summary: The request has been fulfilled and has resulted in one or more new resources being created.

400.headline: 400 Client Error
400.summary: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

500.headline: 500 Server Error
500.summary: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.
